ifYouCloseAcsp: If you close the authorised agent, {BUSINESS NAME} will no longer be registered as an authorised agent with Companies House. This is also known as an Authorised Corporate Service Provider (ACSP).welsh
beforeYouContinueText1: If there are other people who work for the authorised agent, you must welsh
beforeYouContinueLink: check if they’ve been added to the account welsh
beforeYouContinueText2: You’ll need to tell them they will not be able to access the account, or use services for the authorised agent when you close it.welsh
